topics.body:
So, I watched the news in the internet (for the first time in a while) and I get surprised about something. 

A boy died after getting shooted while he was trying to prevent the theft of his PS4. A 24-year-old boy was shot in the chest when he tried to thwart an assault in which a married couple tried to snatch her ​​PS4 console while he was selling it.

topics.body:
After we voted 'No' to independence, the Better Together voters began rallying in George Square, shouting abuse and attacking any opposition.
Well-fucking-Done, fellow Scots.
!http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/232/757/199.jpg!
topics.author: 515ddf93a4c72d8a1f000d57

topics.body:
"@ParagonCommander":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/541c8c09636872779cc20000#post_541c8c09636872779cc20000
There is a riot in progress?
topics.author: 4fde5cee945b700a970060fc

topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/541c8c986368723255c40000#post_541c8c986368723255c40000
It's on a sword-edge.
A high-frequency sword edge.

Seriously, we're pretty close to a fight breaking out, and it's going to be the 'No' sides' fault if it does.
They've been burning the Scottish saltire and doing Nazi salutes near War Memorials.
We allowed this to happen, or more accurately the old did.
Most of the Young voted 'Yes' while the elderly voted 'No'. They won't get to see just what they have done to the young.

I'm usually proud to be Scottish. Now I'm not-so sure.
topics.author: 515ddf93a4c72d8a1f000d57
